SI. No.;Particular;Amount (% in million)
(i);Two percent of average net profit of the Company as per sub-section (5) of section 135;283.3
(ii);Total amount spent for the Financial Year;283.6
(iii);Excess amount spent for the Financial Year [(ii)-(i)];0.3
(iv);Surplus arising out of the CSR projects or programmes or activities of the previous Financial Years, if any;0.0
(v);Amount available for set off in succeeding Financial Years [(iii)-(iv)];0.3
